::Spears::

"Yeah, I can make it." She started walking back to the transport pod.
"But if we take the pod, what will you use Ramulus? My pod won't 
fly.  the main drive coil burned up.  The engine parts and main drive 
systems are useable, but without that coil, it won't lift off again."



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> I'm sorry KSL, I shouldn't tease people with disabilities, ones of 
the brain 
> included.
> 
> ::Ramulus/Striker::
> 
> Ramulus shakes his head. "I'll manage alone."
> 
> Striker looks at Spears. "Can you walk or should I fly you to the 
pod?"
